question: Which ministry has tied up with Ministry of AYUSH to set up an AYUSH Export Promotion Council to boost AYUSH exports?
explanation: The Ministry of Commerce and Industry and the Ministry of AYUSH planned to set up an AYUSH Export Promotion Council to boost AYUSH exports. This decision was taken recently in a joint review by Piyush Goyal, Ministry of Commerce and Industry and Shripad Naik, Ministry of AYUSH.
